description: [Cuckoo Stealer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1153) has captured passwords by prompting victims with a “macOS needs to access System Settings” GUI window.(Citation: Kandji Cuckoo April 2024)

external_references.description: Kohler, A. and Lopez, C. (2024, April 30). Malware: Cuckoo Behaves Like Cross Between Infostealer and Spyware. Retrieved August 20, 2024.
